goal.description: How to End your Randomized playthrough.

description: Does the Beginner Lobby count for checks and items?

Note: Blueberry Bay and its golden requires Beginner Map Crystals, and Beginner Rainbow Berry requires Beginner Map Access Keys. You need 21 Crystals from any lobby to unlock Blueberry Bay - it's highly recommended to have this option on when playing with any Blueberry Bay ending, but technically not required if you use other lobby hearts.
Does the Intermediate Lobby count for checks and items?
Note: Rasberry Roots requires Intermediate Map Crystals, and Intermediate Rainbow Berry requires Intermediate Map Access Keys.
Does the Advanced Lobby count for checks and items?
Note: Magno Mesa requires Advanced Map Crystals. Enable if your End Objective is ??? to maintain a valid seed or something like that.
Do Silver Berries in Beginner Lobby count as locations?
Recommended, but not required for Beginner Rainbow Berry Completion
Do Silver Berries in Intermediate Lobby count as locations?
Recommended, but not required for Intermediate Rainbow Berry Completion
